item.title: Using context classification to develop intersection Safety Performance Functions: national survey of current practices and evaluation of benefits for rural Florida intersections
item.description: This paper was presented at TRB 2021. The presentation is available here.

item.title: Evaluating the benefits of using a context classification system to develop intersection safety performance functions
Regional Perspective of Safety Performance Functions and Their Application to Florida Intersections in Suburban Residential and Urban General Context Classification Categories
TRB 2021: Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations 2021
item.description: This presentation was sponsored by the Standing Committee on Regional Transportation Systems Management and Operations (ACP10). Its associated paper number was TRBAM-21-00078. It was later published in Advances in Transportation Studies and is available here.

item.title: A Roadway Context Classification Approach for Developing Safety Performance Functions and Determining Traffic Operational Effects for Florida Intersections
Developing context-specific safety performance functions for Florida intersections to more accurately predict intersection crashes
